xmldoc.moosapp:
pLatLon2LocalGrid Toutatis AUVs - ENSTA Bretagne 2015
Jeremy Nicola
MIT
NORTHING_PUBLICATION_NAME = GPS_N EASTING_PUBLICATION_NAME = GPS_E
LatLon2LocalGrid uses the MOOSGeodesy lib to compute a local projection of the lat,lon given by the GPS in degrees around an origin. The given projections are in meters.
LAT_SUBSCRIPTION_NAME string The name of the MOOSVar that gives GPS Latitude, in degrees
LON_SUBSCRIPTION_NAME string The name of the MOOSVar that gives GPS Longitude, in degrees
EASTING_PUBLICATION_NAME string The name of the MOOSVar that gives the Easting, in meters. POSITIVE means you go to the EAST from the origin, NEGATIVE means you go to the WEST
NORTHING_PUBLICATION_NAME string The name of the MOOSVar that gives the Northing, in meters. POSITIVE means you go to the NORTH from the origin, NEGATIVE means you go to the SOUTH
No comment.
No suggested improvements.
